statements: SELECT * FROM customer_purchases;
SELECT customer_id, product_id FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, purchase_date FROM customer_purchases WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM customer_purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_products > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_purchases WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_purchases, customer_id FROM customer_purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_purchases WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(purchase_date) AS latest_purchase_date FROM customer_purchases GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY latest_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name, email;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, recommendation_date FROM customers c JOIN recommendations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, recommended_product_id, recommendation_date FROM customers c JOIN recommendations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id WHERE r.customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'electronics';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, recommendation_date FROM customers JOIN recommendations ON customers.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id WHERE recommendations.customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, age FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT product_id, name, category, price FROM Products ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT Products.name, Products.category, Purchases.purchase_date FROM Products JOIN Purchases ON Products.product_id = Purchases.product_id WHERE Products.price > 100 ORDER BY Products.price DESC;

SELECT Recommendations.customer_id, Recommendations.recommended_product_id, Products.name AS recommended_product_name FROM Recommendations JOIN Products ON Recommendations.recommended_product_id = Products.product_id ORDER BY Recommendations.customer_id;
